FULLDISABLE.name: Disable all default additions
FULLDISABLE.hint: Disables all the default item types added by the module. Is used mostly if you intent to only use the module as an API from scratch. For a more manual change, use the second setting.

MANUALADDITIONS.name: Configure specific types, remove and add new ones manually
MANUALADDITIONS.hint: Manual changes to the new item types and categories.
MANUALADDITIONS.label: Configure
